text: 58|10|(geudeul-ui) bimilseuleon daehwaneun ojig satan-eulobuteo bilosdoen geos-eulo midneun jadeul-i seulpeohadolog hagi wiham-ila. geuleona hananim-ui heolag-i eobsneun isang geu(satan)neun geudeul(midneun jadeul)eul gyeolko haechiji moshanola. geuleoni midneun jadeul-eun ojig hananimkkeman uitaghadolog hala
